description:
The other APIs block unexpected attributes on request bodies with additionalProperties  feature of JSON-Schema.
However, it doesn't work on  assisted_volume_snapshots API now.
title: additionalProperties validation doesn't work on assisted_volume_snapshots API

comments.content:
The other APIs block unexpected attributes on request bodies with additionalProperties  feature of JSON-Schema.
However, it doesn't work on  assisted_volume_snapshots API now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~oomichi

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/308018
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/308018
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=4ad8a86b3019be75a3b5e8ac72e95ff312c8d3cb
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 4ad8a86b3019be75a3b5e8ac72e95ff312c8d3cb
Author: Ken'ichi Ohmichi <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Apr 19 12:44:54 2016 -0700

    Fix the schema of assisted_volume_snapshots
    
    The position of both 'required' and 'additionalProperties' was wrong
    and the additionalProperties validation didn't work at all.
    This patch fixes it by changing the position.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1572303
    Change-Id: I8eaf7f7c3340321893edcb651983e9133a33e5a1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 14.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
